sentences.en: A regular triathlon includes a 6.2 - mile run, 25 - mile bike ride and 1 - mile swim.
sentences.cn: 正规的三项全能赛包括6.2英里的长跑, 25英里的骑自行车和1英里的游泳.

sentences.en: A triathlon combines three events – running, swimming and bicycling.
sentences.cn: 三项全能赛包括三项比赛——赛跑 、 长距离游泳和骑自行车.

sentences.en: Although the origi of taekwondo date back thousands of years, the triathlon dates back to 1978.
sentences.cn: 跆拳道的起源可追溯到几千年以前, 而铁人三项在1978年才诞生.

sentences.en: Any swimming stroke can be used in triathlon.
sentences.cn: 铁人三项赛的游泳可以采用任何泳姿.

sentences.en: Anyone can watch the triathlon, marathons, road cycling, and sailing - all free of charge.
sentences.cn: 任何人都能观看铁人三项 、 马拉松 、 公路自行车赛和帆船赛 —— 它们全部免费.

sentences.en: Brian: I am in the triathlon. Why don't you join in?
sentences.cn: 布莱恩: 我要参加三项全能赛. 你为甚麽不参加?

sentences.en: Exp : What was the biggest challenge of the triathlon?
sentences.cn: “铁人三项”最大的挑战是什么?

sentences.en: I wonder if you 1 l watch the triathlon race tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 你明天要看铁人三项赛吗?

sentences.en: I’m happy to report that I finished my first sprint triathlon this morning!
sentences.cn: 我很高兴来汇报今早完成的第一次急速短跑三项全能运动！

sentences.en: SIG is now the vice - President a Korean triathlon association.
sentences.cn: 他是副总裁铁人三项联合会.

sentences.en: The London Triathlon comprises a demanding 1500 - metre swim, a 40 - kilometre bike ride and a 10 - kilometre run.
sentences.cn: 伦敦铁人三项包括要求1500米游泳, 40公里骑自行车和10公里长跑.

sentences.en: Then somebody said, " Hey, Dick, why not a triathlon?'"
sentences.cn: 然后有人说, “ 嘿, 迪克, 为什么不参加三项全能赛? ”

sentences.en: Triathlon became an Olympic event in 2000.
sentences.cn: 铁人三项于2000年成为奥运会比赛项目.

sentences.en: Triathlon begins with swimming, followed by cycling and running.
sentences.cn: 铁人三项开始是游泳, 然后是自行车和赛跑.

sentences.en: What has made the triathlon one of the most attractive Olympic sports?
sentences.cn: 是什么使得铁人三项运动成为奥运会最具吸引力的体育项目之一?

sentences.en: Xing Lin Triathlon athletes to overcome a major injury, once again return to the Olympic Games.
sentences.cn: 铁人三项运动员邢琳,克服了重大伤病, 再度重返奥运赛场.
